00199 struct __EZV24_PORT_HANDLE
00200 {
00201         int fd;                              
00202         int Errno;                           
00203         int Locked;                          
00204         int lock_fd;                         
00205         int Initialized;                     
00206         char PortName[V24_SZ_PORTNAME+1];    
00207         unsigned int OpenFlags;              
00208         int Baudrate;                        
00209         int Datasize;                        
00210         int Parity;                          
00211         int TimeoutValue;                    
00212 };
